collection_holder_name: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext.collection_title: Music for the connoisseur [sound recording] : Folk music sampling.
pageContext.collection_description: La mulita -- Korobeyniki (The peddler or The box) -- Schwefelhölze (Sulphur matches) -- Hanging Johnny -- Sample of Flamenco music -- A soulcake -- Panou sta alonia -- Gitare ; Sheltn, shelt ich dem tog -- Folksong from French Africa (excerpt) -- Xango, a Brazilian Negro cantata for soprano, chorus and orchestra / J. Siqueira -- Brief talk (from 2nd World Festival of Folksong and Folk dance, summer 1953) / R. Vaughan Williams ; [Jabadao] (Brittany, France) ; Chanson de fête (Basque, Spain) -- Agur izar eri (Basque) -- Why do you sit up until midnight? (Russian folk song)
